goal:
We strive to keep individuals and their problems and concerns, our focal point. Acknowledging our role as the largest financial institution of the country and a pillar of society, we provide support to social groups in need, under two pillars of action: Health and Education (BOC Oncology Center, BOC Cultural Fountation etc)

We continue to deliver on our strategic objectives of becoming a stronger, more focused institution capable of further supporting the recovery of Cyprus and capable of delivering appropriate shareholder returns over the medium term.
